Text: I am hurt for you that there are not hundreds of ecstatic thanks here. The quality of the scans is almost archival, probably surpassed those standards in 2008. This remains the only torrent where certain of these most wonderful classics are collected. I truly wish my single voice could stand for hundreds. Thank you.

I would like to express my gratitude to you and to your wife for your work! I live in a country where English is a foreign language and it's quite difficult to get any books in English here, so your book packs will be so useful for me and for my daughter! The quality of scanning is perfect and the file sizes are quite moderate at the same time.
Please, if possible, keep on doing this great job of yours, you are helping so many parents to entertain their children!
I will seed all your book packs as long as I can)
THANK YOU AND YOUR WIFE SOOO MUCH FOR THESE BOOKS! They are top notch quality and once I saw them I just had to register and let you know how much they are appreciated! Thank you!
Thanks so much, your effort is appreciated.
Wow. Thanks for this work and results. I got all 8 and find them to be great for the grandson and me to review and read together.
Love all the Kids' book packs!!!! Thank you for all your hard work, it is greatly appreciated!!!
